| HistoryText             = The Cavalry begins as one of the superhero teams under the Government-sponsored team created as part of [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|50-State Initiative]]. The team was created and based in Georgia following the conclusion of the "[[Civil War]]" . Thor Girl, one of the team members, is revealed to be a [[Tarene (Skrull) (Earth-616)|Skrull impostor]].{{r|Avengers: The Initiative Vol 1 18}}

[[Wallace Jackson (Earth-616)|Red 9]] later joined, once his training time achieved.{{r|Avengers: The Initiative Vol 1 21}}

===[[Fear Itself]]===
The Cavalry, without the [[Eugene Mason (Earth-616)|Crime-Buster]], stoped a hold-up in [[Atlanta]] right before they are summoned to a meeting by [[Richard Gilmore (Earth-616)|Prodigy]] regarding magical hammers that have crashed into the earth.{{r|Fear Itself: Youth in Revolt Vol 1 1}}

...

[[Tarene (Earth-616)|Thor Girl]] turned into the Designate and left [[Earth]].{{r|Fear Itself: Youth in Revolt Vol 1 6}}
